alert.note: Alert for Brown; Cherry; Keya Paha (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 7:04PM CDT until July 21 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Cherry County in north central Nebraska... Northwestern Brown County in north central Nebraska... West central Keya Paha County in north central Nebraska... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 703 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles northwest of Norden, or 14 miles east of Valentine, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wood Lake, Sparks and Smith Falls State Park. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 216 and 220. Highway 12 between mile markers 13 and 28. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
